overview: The 'More Information' page of Digital Experience Healthcare provides a searchable and filterable list of healthcare services. It includes navigation, theme toggling, accessibility features, and dynamic service card rendering controlled by JavaScript.
key_components: Sticky navigation bar with brand and menu
Service cards grid with skeleton loaders and dynamic content
interactions: Theme toggle switches between light/dark mode
Typing in search input filters visible service cards
Clicking filter chips applies category filters
Changing sort dropdown reorders service cards
Service cards reveal after data load replacing skeleton loaders
data_flow: Initial page load shows skeleton loaders
JavaScript fetches or reveals service card data
Search input filters cards by title or description
Filter chips modify visible cards based on data-tags
Sort dropdown changes order based on data-popularity or alphabetical
Theme toggle updates global UI state
accessibility: ARIA labels on navigation and filter groups
Visually hidden labels for search input
Alt text for all service images
analytics: Track search input usage and query terms
Track filter chip clicks and selected categories
Track service card impressions and clicks
test_ideas: Verify skip-to-content link moves focus correctly
Validate navbar links navigate to correct routes
Ensure theme toggle updates body class and persists state
Test search filtering accuracy and case insensitivity
Confirm filter chips toggle visibility of correct service cards
Check sort dropdown reorders cards by popularity/alphabetical
Ensure skeleton loaders are replaced by service cards after load
Validate all images have non-empty alt attributes
Confirm analytics events fire on user interactions
